name: From Auntie to Zesty Multiple Choice Quiz | Alphabetical Words | 25 Questions

questions.explanation:
antsy.

	Or alley or analogy or ability.

bigamy.

	Or bushy or biology or botany.

chatty.

	Remember Chatty Cathy? Or chary or clammy.

questions.correct: ditzy & dizzy & daffy & dingy & dopey & ditsy & dippy
questions.explanation:
ditzy & dizzy & daffy & dingy & dopey & ditsy & dippy.

	Or dolly or dally or daily.

empty.

	Or energy or ecology or enemy.

foxy.

	Foxy Lady! Or furry or fidgety or filly.

goalie.

	Or gully or gaily or golly.

holy.

	Or hurry or hairy or hoary.

iffy.

	Or icky or icy or inky.

jiffy.

	Or jolly or jelly or jaunty.

khaki.

	Or kitty or kingly or Kabuki or kamikaze.

lanky.

	Or lonely or lemony or loamy or lily.

money.

	Or many or manly or mystery or ministry.

nosey & nosy.

	Or ninny or nanny or nary or necessary.

Opie.

	Opie grew up to be a good movie director, although I detested 'The Grinch.' Or obesity or oligarchy or odyssey.

putty.

	Or pity or petty or party or pansy.

quaky.

	Or quackery or quaggy or Quincy.

racy.

	Or runny or ritzy or really.

settee.

	Or sully or silly or seemingly or sanitary.

questions.text: Name for a sexy girl OR a Dustin Hoffman movie?
questions.explanation:
tootsie.

	Or tally or temerity or tree or tee or tea.

uppity.

	Or university or unhappy or unholy.

virility.

	Or vitality or very or victory or valley.

whinny.

	Or witty or worldly or wormy.

questions.text: I'm skipping X (though I found xenogeny in the Scrabble dictionary). The abominable snowman?
questions.explanation:
yeti.

	Or yellowy or yummy or yogi or yogini (female yogi).

zucchini.

	Or zany or zymology (the science of fermentation).
